cards.name: Ajani, Caller of the Pride
cards.text:
[+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.
[−3]: Target creature gains flying and double strike until end of turn.
[−8]: Create X 2/2 white Cat creature tokens, where X is your life total.

foreignPrintings.name: 群れの統率者アジャニ

cards.name: Ajani's Sunstriker
cards.text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
cards.flavor: "Ajani goes where he is needed most and in his name we keep his lands safe."

cards.name: Angel's Mercy
cards.text: You gain 7 life.
cards.flavor:
"She rose above me, and in that moment Varrik the Bloody died and I was born."
-Varrik the Just

cards.name: Angelic Benediction
cards.text:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, you may tap target creature.
cards.flavor: "Only the bravest are worthy of our blessing."

cards.name: Attended Knight
cards.text:
First strike
When Attended Knight enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

cards.name: Aven Squire
cards.text:
Flying
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
cards.flavor: When the meek charge into battle, courage becomes infectious.

cards.name: Battleflight Eagle
cards.text:
Flying
When Battleflight Eagle enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Eagles make fine mounts, but they're too proud to carry anyone for long.

cards.name: Captain of the Watch
cards.text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
Other Soldier creatures you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.
When Captain of the Watch enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

cards.name: Captain's Call
cards.text: Create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
cards.flavor:
"Who among you has the courage to face certain death? Who will heed my call?"
-Rayel Vanger, Firstblade of Thune

cards.name: Crusader of Odric
cards.text: Crusader of Odric's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.
cards.flavor: "We are Odric's sword. We strike without fear, for his mind has divined how our foe will be slain."

cards.name: Divine Favor
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Divine Favor enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.
cards.flavor: With an armory of light, even the squire may champion her people.

cards.name: Divine Verdict
cards.text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.
cards.flavor: "Guilty."

cards.name: Erase
cards.text: Exile target enchantment.
cards.flavor:
"Don't trust your eyes, for mages are skilled in deception. Trust only in your faith. It will wipe everything clean."
-Lila, Erunian priest

cards.name: Faith's Reward
cards.text: Return to the battlefield all permanent cards in your graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn.
cards.flavor:
"I thought the wind was ushering me to my final destination, but it lifted me to my feet and I fought on."
-Idrus, war priest of Thune

cards.name: Glorious Charge
cards.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"One's blade is only as sharp as one's conviction."
-Ajani Goldmane

cards.name: Griffin Protector
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Griffin Protector gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The drums of war stir the hearts of all who fight for righteousness.

cards.name: Guardian Lions
cards.text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
cards.flavor: Approach in peace or not at all.

cards.name: Guardians of Akrasa
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
cards.flavor:
"Only by the bravery of those who put loyalty above glory is our home kept safe."
-Elspeth Tirel

cards.name: Healer of the Pride
cards.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 2 life.
cards.flavor: "No life is without meaning. No living thing is too small to be strong."

cards.name: Intrepid Hero
cards.text: {T}: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
cards.flavor: A fool knows no fear. A hero shows no fear.

cards.name: Knight of Glory
cards.text:
Protection from black (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black.)
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
cards.flavor: "I will uphold the law, and no manner of foe will stop me."

cards.name: Oblivion Ring
cards.text:
When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent.
When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

cards.name: Odric, Master Tactician
cards.text:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Whenever Odric, Master Tactician and at least three other creatures attack, you choose which creatures block this combat and how those creatures block.
cards.flavor: "Fear holds no place in faith's battle plan."

foreignPrintings.name: 熟練の戦術家、オドリック

cards.name: Pacifism
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
cards.flavor: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

cards.name: Pillarfield Ox
cards.flavor:
"May starving fleas birth a thousand generations on your stubborn hide, cow!"
-Bruse Tarl, Goma Fada nomad

cards.name: Planar Cleansing
cards.text: Destroy all nonland permanents.

cards.name: Prized Elephant
cards.text:
Prized Elephant gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Forest.
{G}: Prized Elephant gains trample until end of turn. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

cards.name: Rain of Blades
cards.text: Rain of Blades deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.
cards.flavor: Some say they are the weapons of heroes fallen in battle, eager for one last chance at glory.

cards.name: Rhox Faithmender
cards.text:
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
If you would gain life, you gain twice that much life instead.
cards.flavor: Rhoxes who live long enough to retire from war lend support with their extensive knowledge of combat injuries.

foreignPrintings.name: ロウクスの信仰癒し人

cards.name: Safe Passage
cards.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and creatures you control this turn.
cards.flavor: As she shepherds the faithful, the angel's radiance is a shield of salvation.

cards.name: Serra Angel
cards.text: Flying, vigilance
cards.flavor: Follow the light. In its absence, follow her.

cards.name: Serra Avatar
cards.text:
Serra Avatar's power and toughness are each equal to your life total.
When Serra Avatar is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.
cards.flavor: "Serra isn't dead. She lives on through me."

cards.name: Serra Avenger
cards.text:
You can't cast this spell during your first, second, or third turns of the game.
Flying
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

cards.name: Show of Valor
cards.text: Target creature gets +2/+4 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Duty, honor, and valor are either in your heart or they are not. You will never know for certain until you are tested."
-Ajani Goldmane

cards.name: Silvercoat Lion
cards.flavor:
"In the wild, white fur like mine is an aberration. We lack natural camouflage, but the inability to hide encourages other strengths."
-Ajani Goldmane

cards.name: Sublime Archangel
cards.text:
Flying
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Other creatures you control have exalted. (If a creature has multiple instances of exalted, each triggers separately.)

cards.name: Touch of the Eternal
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, count the number of permanents you control. Your life total becomes that number.
cards.flavor:
"Time is a vigilant tyrant, but there are those who have broken free of its gaze."
-Laikas, Erunian monk

cards.name: War Falcon
cards.text:
Flying
War Falcon can't attack unless you control a Knight or a Soldier.
cards.flavor: The falcon is the picture of nobility, maintaining a regal bearing even as it conducts the bloody business of war.

cards.name: War Priest of Thune
cards.text: When War Priest of Thune enters the battlefield, you may destroy target enchantment.
cards.flavor: "The sacred might of Thune thunders in my soul."

cards.name: Warclamp Mastiff
cards.text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
cards.flavor:
"One bite from that dog will send you to the healer's tent for days."
-Watchmaster Finn of An Karras

cards.name: Archaeomancer
cards.text: When Archaeomancer enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: "Words of power never disappear. They sleep, awaiting those with the will to rouse them."

cards.name: Arctic Aven
cards.text:
Flying
Arctic Aven gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Plains.
{W}: Arctic Aven gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

cards.name: Augur of Bolas
cards.text: When Augur of Bolas enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an instant or sorcery card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Battle of Wits
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 200 or more cards in your library, you win the game.
cards.flavor: There is no loftier ambition than the pursuit of knowledge.

cards.name: Clone
cards.text: You may have Clone enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.
cards.flavor: One face, two minds.

cards.name: Courtly Provocateur
cards.text:
{T}: Target creature attacks this turn if able.
{T}: Target creature blocks this turn if able.
cards.flavor: "My one regret is that I have mastered an art that leaves its audience unable to applaud."

cards.name: Divination
cards.text: Draw two cards.
cards.flavor:
"The key to unlocking this puzzle is within you."
-Doriel, mentor of Mistral Isle

cards.name: Downpour
cards.text: Tap up to three target creatures.
cards.flavor:
"The sky holds vast oceans. They are at your fingertips if you know how to call them."
-Talrand, sky summoner

cards.name: Encrust
cards.text:
Enchant artifact or creature
Enchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step and its activated abilities can't be activated.
cards.flavor:
"Barnacles are the sea's final defense."
-Garild, merfolk mage

cards.name: Essence Scatter
cards.text: Counter target creature spell.
cards.flavor:
"What you attempt to pull from the Æther, I can spread onto the wind."
-Jace Beleren

cards.name: Faerie Invaders
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
cards.flavor: Small enough to penetrate the narrowest crack in a castle wall and numerous enough to hack apart a griffin.

cards.name: Fog Bank
cards.text:
Defender, flying
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by Fog Bank.
cards.flavor:
"The union of sea and sky makes a perfect cover."
-Talrand, sky summoner

cards.name: Harbor Serpent
cards.text:
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
Harbor Serpent can't attack unless there are five or more Islands on the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Like most giant monsters villagers worship as gods, it proves a fickle master.

cards.name: Hydrosurge
cards.text: Target creature gets -5/-0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Thirsty?"
-Drunvalus, hydromancer

cards.name: Index
cards.text: Look at the top five cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
cards.flavor: "What good is having all the right answers if you have them at all the wrong times?"

cards.name: Jace, Memory Adept
cards.text:
[+1]: Draw a card. Target player mills a card.
[0]: Target player mills ten cards.
[−7]: Any number of target players each draw twenty cards.

foreignPrintings.name: 記憶の熟達者、ジェイス

cards.name: Jace's Phantasm
cards.text:
Flying
Jace's Phantasm gets +4/+4 as long as an opponent has ten or more cards in their graveyard.
cards.flavor: In the abstract memories of the Iquati, Jace found interesting ideas to improve upon.

cards.name: Kraken Hatchling
cards.flavor: A spike and a maul are needed to crack their shells, but the taste is worth the effort.

cards.name: Master of the Pearl Trident
cards.text: Other Merfolk creatures you control get +1/+1 and have islandwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
cards.flavor: "Let the land dwellers know the coast is no longer the border between our realms. A new age of empire has begun."

cards.name: Merfolk of the Pearl Trident
cards.flavor:
"The merfolk of the Pearl Trident have risen from the waves since the earliest days, at times allies to humans, other times enemies. Now their power is cresting again, and who can say which way the new tide will flow."
-Kalis, Onean scholar

cards.name: Mind Sculpt
cards.text: Target opponent mills seven cards.
cards.flavor:
"Your mind was a curious mix of madness and genius. I just took away the genius."
-Jace Beleren

cards.name: Negate
cards.text: Counter target noncreature spell.
cards.flavor: Masters of the arcane savor a delicious irony. Their study of deep and complex arcana leads to such a simple end: the ability to say merely yes or no.

cards.name: Omniscience
cards.text: You may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.
cards.flavor:
"The things I once imagined would be my greatest achievements were only the first steps toward a future I can only begin to fathom."
-Jace Beleren

cards.name: Redirect
cards.text: You may choose new targets for target spell.
cards.flavor:
"It's actually quite simple, but since you've only recently begun to walk upright, it may take some time to explain."
-Jace Beleren, to Garruk Wildspeaker

cards.name: Rewind
cards.text: Counter target spell. Untap up to four lands.
cards.flavor: "The best denials are simply that: a beginning and end unchanged, a dream with no memory."

cards.name: Scroll Thief
cards.text: Whenever Scroll Thief deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
cards.flavor: The arcane academies along the coast were powerless to protect themselves from the brazen raiders of the Kapsho Seas.

cards.name: Sleep
cards.text: Tap all creatures target player controls. Those creatures don't untap during that player's next untap step.
cards.flavor:
"I give them dreams so wondrous that they hesitate to return to the world of the conscious."
-Garild, merfolk mage

cards.name: Spelltwine
cards.text: Exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard and target instant or sorcery card from an opponent's graveyard. Copy those cards. Cast the copies if able without paying their mana costs. Exile Spelltwine.

cards.name: Sphinx of Uthuun
cards.text:
Flying
When Sphinx of Uthuun enters the battlefield, reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

foreignPrintings.name: ウスーンのスフィンクス

cards.name: Stormtide Leviathan
cards.text:
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
All lands are Islands in addition to their other types.
Creatures without flying or islandwalk can't attack.

cards.name: Switcheroo
cards.text: Exchange control of two target creatures.
cards.flavor: Say hello to your new friend.

cards.name: Talrand, Sky Summoner
cards.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying.
cards.flavor: "The seas are vast, but the skies are even more so. Why be content with one kingdom when I can rule them both?"

cards.name: Talrand's Invocation
cards.text: Create two 2/2 blue Drake creature tokens with flying.
cards.flavor: After Talrand conquered the depths of Shandalar, his ambitions drove him skyward, joined by servants whose drive and curiosity equaled his own.

cards.name: Tricks of the Trade
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and can't be blocked.
cards.flavor: "Pathetic. You might as well have protected your treasures with a paper box and some string."

cards.name: Unsummon
cards.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: Not to be. That is the answer.

cards.name: Vedalken Entrancer
cards.text: {U}, {T}: Target player mills two cards.
cards.flavor: "Don't get any ideas."

foreignPrintings.name: ヴィダルケンの幻惑者

cards.name: Void Stalker
cards.text: {2}{U}, {T}: Put Void Stalker and target creature on top of their owners' libraries, then those players shuffle their libraries.
cards.flavor: Now you see it, now you're gone.

cards.name: Watercourser
cards.text: {U}: Watercourser gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Beware an eddy where there should be none or a stretch that flows too fast or too slow."
-Old Fishbones, Martyne river guide

cards.name: Welkin Tern
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Welkin Tern can block only creatures with flying.
cards.flavor:
"It preys on other birds. And drakelings. And drakes. Pretty much anything that crosses its flight path is fair game."
-Amira, skycaptain of Thune

cards.name: Wind Drake
cards.text: Flying
cards.flavor: A smaller cousin to the dragon, drakes are often seen at the side of powerful wizards who use them as airborne eyes and ears.

cards.name: Blood Reckoning
cards.text: Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, that creature's controller loses 1 life.
cards.flavor:
"There is no greater folly than standing against me."
-Nicol Bolas

cards.name: Bloodhunter Bat
cards.text:
Flying
When Bloodhunter Bat enters the battlefield, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
cards.flavor: It returns eager to share the feast of blood and gore with its ghoulish master.

cards.name: Bloodthrone Vampire
cards.text: Sacrifice a creature: Bloodthrone Vampire gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "What I need is your blood. What I don't need is your permission."

cards.name: Cower in Fear
cards.text: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"You will fully understand fear when you discover it is the final thing you put your faith in."
-Nicol Bolas

cards.name: Crippling Blight
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 and can't block.
cards.flavor:
"Still alive? No matter. I'll leave you as a warning to others who would oppose me."
-Vish Kal, Blood Arbiter

cards.name: Dark Favor
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Dark Favor enters the battlefield, you lose 1 life.
Enchanted creature gets +3/+1.
cards.flavor: When he began to curse what he held holy, his strength grew unrivaled.

cards.name: Diabolic Revelation
cards.text: Search your library for up to X cards, put those cards into your hand, then shuffle.
cards.flavor:
"There are some secrets so dark no human mind should ever contain them. Interested?"
-Nefarox, Overlord of Grixis

cards.name: Disciple of Bolas
cards.text: When Disciple of Bolas enters the battlefield, sacrifice another creature. You gain X life and draw X cards, where X is that creature's power.
cards.flavor: "Lord Bolas has shown me how each miserable little life holds untold resources."

cards.name: Disentomb
cards.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor:
"I deal so often in rotting corpses that when I come across the freshly dead . . . why, it's like my birthday come early."
-Nevinyrral, necromancer

cards.name: Duress
cards.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
cards.flavor:
"Don't worry. I'm not going to deprive you of all your secrets. Just your most precious one."
-Liliana Vess

cards.name: Duskmantle Prowler
cards.text:
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

foreignPrintings.name: ダスクマントルをうろつくもの

cards.name: Duty-Bound Dead
cards.text:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{3}{B}: Regenerate Duty-Bound Dead. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

cards.name: Essence Drain
cards.text: Essence Drain deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
cards.flavor:
"Life's essence is a nectar unlike any I tasted when I lived as a mortal."
-Zul Ashur, lich lord

cards.name: Giant Scorpion
cards.text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
cards.flavor: Its sting hurts, but death is strangely painless.

cards.name: Harbor Bandit
cards.text:
Harbor Bandit gets +1/+1 as long as you control an Island.
{1}{U}: Harbor Bandit can't be blocked this turn.
cards.flavor: He always drops a little trinket into the bay as thanks to the merfolk who taught him all his best tricks.

cards.name: Knight of Infamy
cards.text:
Protection from white (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything white.)
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
cards.flavor: "Your laws, like your bones, were made to be broken."

cards.name: Liliana of the Dark Realms
cards.text:
[+1]: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
[−3]: Target creature gets +X/+X or -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Swamps you control.
[−6]: You get an emblem with "Swamps you control have '{T}: Add {B}{B}{B}{B}.'"

cards.name: Liliana's Shade
cards.text:
When Liliana's Shade enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{B}: Liliana's Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Mark of the Vampire
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has lifelink.
cards.flavor:
"My 'condition' is a trial. The weak are consumed by it. The strong transcend it."
-Sorin Markov

cards.name: Mind Rot
cards.text: Target player discards two cards.
cards.flavor:
"What a pity. You should have written it down."
-Liliana Vess

cards.name: Murder
cards.text: Destroy target creature.

cards.name: Mutilate
cards.text: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn for each Swamp you control.
cards.flavor:
"It's only torture if you're strong enough to survive. Otherwise, it's a simple, gruesome death. I'm happy either way."
-Liliana Vess

cards.name: Nefarox, Overlord of Grixis
cards.text:
Flying
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever Nefarox, Overlord of Grixis attacks alone, defending player sacrifices a creature.

foreignPrintings.name: グリクシスの首領、ネファロックス

cards.name: Phylactery Lich
cards.text:
Indestructible
As Phylactery Lich enters the battlefield, put a phylactery counter on an artifact you control.
When you control no permanents with phylactery counters on them, sacrifice Phylactery Lich.

cards.name: Public Execution
cards.text: Destroy target creature an opponent controls. Each other creature that player controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Though the executioner did not speak, the villagers got the message.

cards.name: Ravenous Rats
cards.text: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.
cards.flavor: Devouring books is only the beginning. The librarian's next.

cards.name: Rise from the Grave
cards.text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.
cards.flavor:
"For my enemies, one death. For my allies, many."
-Liliana Vess

cards.name: Servant of Nefarox
cards.text: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
cards.flavor: "My cause is power, and at the altar of power I will gladly forfeit my soul."

foreignPrintings.name: ネファロックスの召使い

cards.name: Shimian Specter
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Shimian Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. Search that player's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then that player shuffles.

cards.name: Sign in Blood
cards.text: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.
cards.flavor: Little agonies pave the way to greater power.

cards.name: Tormented Soul
cards.text: Tormented Soul can't block and can't be blocked.
cards.flavor: Those who raged most bitterly at the world in life are cursed to roam the nether realms in death.

cards.name: Vampire Nighthawk
cards.text: Flying, deathtouch, lifelink

cards.name: Vampire Nocturnus
cards.text:
Play with the top card of your library revealed.
As long as the top card of your library is black, Vampire Nocturnus and other Vampire creatures you control get +2/+1 and have flying.
cards.flavor: "Your life will set with the sun."

cards.name: Veilborn Ghoul
cards.text:
Veilborn Ghoul can't block.
Whenever a Swamp enters the battlefield under your control, you may return Veilborn Ghoul from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: Liliana's voice carries far, reaching beyond the cold pall of death.

foreignPrintings.name: ヴェール生まれのグール

cards.name: Vile Rebirth
cards.text: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
cards.flavor:
"'Here lies our beloved Gartu, the gentlest of all men.' Ooh, I love irony."
-Jadar, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

cards.name: Walking Corpse
cards.flavor:
"Feeding a normal army is a problem of logistics. With zombies, it is an asset. Feeding is why they fight. Feeding is why they are feared."
-Jadar, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

cards.name: Wit's End
cards.text: Target player discards their hand.
cards.flavor:
"Your pathetic ideas lie in shambles, Planeswalker. Where is your arrogant pride now?"
-Nicol Bolas

cards.name: Xathrid Gorgon
cards.text:
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
{2}{B}, {T}: Put a petrification counter on target creature. It gains defender and becomes a colorless artifact in addition to its other types. Its activated abilities can't be activated. (A creature with defender can't attack.)

foreignPrintings.name: ザスリッドのゴルゴン

cards.name: Zombie Goliath
cards.flavor:
"Removing the encumbrance of useless brain tissue grants several advantages: a slight increase in mobility, a response of revulsion and horror from the enemy, and, in the case of large specimens, room for passengers."
-Zul Ashur, lich lord

cards.name: Arms Dealer
cards.text: {1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Arms Dealer deals 4 damage to target creature.
cards.flavor:
"Guaranteed to leave your enemies sufficiently stabbed, bitten, cleaved, or exploded."
-Grezkrick's Emporium motto

cards.name: Bladetusk Boar
cards.text: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
cards.flavor: Those who dare stand in its path are either brave or mindless. Or in the case of goblins, both.

cards.name: Canyon Minotaur
cards.flavor:
"We'll scale these cliffs, traverse Brittle Bridge, and then fight our way down the volcanic slopes on the other side."
"Isn't the shortest route through the canyon?"
"Yes."
"So shouldn't we-"
"No."

cards.name: Chandra, the Firebrand
cards.text:
[+1]: Chandra, the Firebrand deals 1 damage to any target.
[−2]: When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
[−6]: Chandra, the Firebrand deals 6 damage to each of up to six targets.

cards.name: Chandra's Fury
cards.text: Chandra's Fury deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker and 1 damage to each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.
cards.flavor: "I asked if they wanted to do things the easy way. I meant easy for me."

cards.name: Cleaver Riot
cards.text: Creatures you control gain double strike until end of turn. (They deal both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
cards.flavor: Measure once, cut twice.

cards.name: Craterize
cards.text: Destroy target land.
cards.flavor:
"'Utterly' is my favorite way to destroy something."
-Chandra Nalaar

cards.name: Crimson Muckwader
cards.text:
Crimson Muckwader gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Swamp.
{2}{B}: Regenerate Crimson Muckwader. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

cards.name: Dragon Hatchling
cards.text:
Flying
{R}: Dragon Hatchling gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Those dragons grow fast. For a while they feed on squirrels and goblins and then suddenly you're missing a mammoth."
-Hurdek, Mazar mammoth trainer

cards.name: Fervor
cards.text: Creatures you control have haste. (They can attack and {T} as soon as they come under your control.)
cards.flavor:
"We won't sit like lazy gob-slugs waiting for death to come to us. We'll bring death, shiny sharp, to our enemies."
-Krenko, mob boss

cards.name: Fire Elemental
cards.flavor:
"Fire set free is a fearsome force-destructive, merciless, always hungry. Given direction, it is much worse."
-Jeflin, Vastwood shaman

cards.name: Firewing Phoenix
cards.text:
Flying
{1}{R}{R}{R}: Return Firewing Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor:
"When a phoenix nests in a volcano, we rejoice, for it means a hundred years of war."
-Golmak, Keldon warlord

cards.name: Flames of the Firebrand
cards.text: Flames of the Firebrand deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.
cards.flavor:
"You're in luck. I brought enough to share."
-Chandra Nalaar

cards.name: Furnace Whelp
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{R}: Furnace Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Baby dragons can't figure out humans-if they didn't want to be killed, why were they made of meat and treasure?

cards.name: Goblin Arsonist
cards.text: When Goblin Arsonist dies, you may have it deal 1 damage to any target.
cards.flavor: With great power comes great risk of getting yourself killed.

cards.name: Goblin Battle Jester
cards.text: Whenever you cast a red spell, target creature can't block this turn.
cards.flavor: Somehow goblins found a tactical advantage by sending a clown to war.

cards.name: Hamletback Goliath
cards.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may put X +1/+1 counters on Hamletback Goliath, where X is that creature's power.
cards.flavor:
"If you live on a giant's back, there's only one individual you'll ever need to fear."
-Gaddock Teeg

cards.name: Kindled Fury
cards.text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Rage is a dangerous weapon. Your enemies will try to use your anger against you. Use it against them first."
-Ajani Goldmane

cards.name: Krenko, Mob Boss
cards.text: {T}: Create X 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens, where X is the number of Goblins you control.
cards.flavor:
"He displays a perverse charisma fueled by avarice. Highly dangerous. Recommend civil sanctions."
-Agmand Sarv, Azorius hussar

cards.name: Krenko's Command
cards.text: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
cards.flavor: Goblins are eager to follow orders, especially when those orders involve stealing, hurting, annoying, eating, destroying, or swearing.

cards.name: Magmaquake
cards.text: Magmaquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each planeswalker.
cards.flavor:
"Where will you run when I punish you with the very ground you flee on?"
-Nicol Bolas

cards.name: Mark of Mutiny
cards.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it and untap it. That creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
cards.flavor: The flame of anger is hard to douse once lit.

cards.name: Mindclaw Shaman
cards.text: When Mindclaw Shaman enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You may cast an instant or sorcery spell from among those cards without paying its mana cost.
cards.flavor: Nicol Bolas gives power to those who will abuse it most.

cards.name: Mogg Flunkies
cards.text: Mogg Flunkies can't attack or block alone.
cards.flavor: They'll attack whatever's in front of them-as long as you tell them where that is.

cards.name: Reckless Brute
cards.text:
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
Reckless Brute attacks each combat if able.
cards.flavor: His mind knows no fear, registering only the burning impulse to destroy.

cards.name: Reverberate
cards.text: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
cards.flavor: "Not bad, but I can think of a better use for that."

cards.name: Rummaging Goblin
cards.text: {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
cards.flavor: To a goblin, value is based on the four S's: shiny, stabby, smelly, and super smelly.

cards.name: Searing Spear
cards.text: Searing Spear deals 3 damage to any target.
cards.flavor: Sometimes you die a glorious death with your sword held high. Sometimes you're just target practice.

cards.name: Slumbering Dragon
cards.text:
Flying
Slumbering Dragon can't attack or block unless it has five or more +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, put a +1/+1 counter on Slumbering Dragon.

cards.name: Smelt
cards.text: Destroy target artifact.
cards.flavor:
"Looks like that wasn't darksteel after all."
-Koth of the Hammer

cards.name: Thundermaw Hellkite
cards.text:
Flying
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
When Thundermaw Hellkite enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each creature with flying your opponents control. Tap those creatures.

cards.name: Torch Fiend
cards.text: {R}, Sacrifice Torch Fiend: Destroy target artifact.
cards.flavor: Devils redecorate every room with fire.

cards.name: Trumpet Blast
cards.text: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Keldon warriors don't need signals to tell them when to attack. They need signals to tell them when to stop.

cards.name: Turn to Slag
cards.text: Turn to Slag deals 5 damage to target creature. Destroy all Equipment attached to that creature.
cards.flavor:
"If it wasn't a blackened, stinking, melted abomination before, it certainly is now."
-Koth of the Hammer

cards.name: Volcanic Geyser
cards.text: Volcanic Geyser deals X damage to any target.
cards.flavor: "The mountain's fire surges beneath your feet, demanding release. Can you not feel it?"

cards.name: Volcanic Strength
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has mountainwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
cards.flavor: The mountains bend to no one.

cards.name: Wall of Fire
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{R}: Wall of Fire gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Mercy is for those who keep their distance.

cards.name: Wild Guess
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.
cards.flavor: No guts, no glory.

cards.name: Worldfire
cards.text: Exile all permanents. Exile all cards from all hands and graveyards. Each player's life total becomes 1.
cards.flavor: Even the smallest spark may set a world ablaze.

cards.name: Acidic Slime
cards.text:
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
When Acidic Slime enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

cards.name: Arbor Elf
cards.text: {T}: Untap target Forest.
cards.flavor: "The forest will surround you with its life if you are still and calm."

cards.name: Bond Beetle
cards.text: When Bond Beetle enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
cards.flavor:
A beetle on your shoulder
-Elvish expression meaning "a blessing of luck"

cards.name: Boundless Realms
cards.text: Search your library for up to X basic land cards, where X is the number of lands you control, and put them onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor:
"Planeswalking cannot be taught. Either you see the doors or you do not."
-Nissa Revane

cards.name: Bountiful Harvest
cards.text: You gain 1 life for each land you control.
cards.flavor:
"When we fail to see the beauty in every tree, we are no better than humans."
-Saelia, elvish scout

cards.name: Centaur Courser
cards.flavor:
"The centaurs are truly free. Never will they be tamed by temptation or controlled by fear. They live in total harmony, a feat not yet achieved by our kind."
-Ramal, sage of Westgate

foreignPrintings.name: ケンタウルスの狩猟者

cards.name: Deadly Recluse
cards.text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
cards.flavor: Even dragons fear its silken strands.

cards.name: Duskdale Wurm
cards.text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

cards.name: Elderscale Wurm
cards.text:
Trample
When Elderscale Wurm enters the battlefield, if your life total is less than 7, your life total becomes 7.
As long as you have 7 or more life, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 7 reduces it to 7 instead.

cards.name: Elvish Archdruid
cards.text:
Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1.
{T}: Add {G} for each Elf you control.
cards.flavor: He knows the name of every elf born in the last four centuries. More importantly, they all know his.

cards.name: Elvish Visionary
cards.text: When Elvish Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.
cards.flavor: "From a tiny sprout, the greatest trees grow and flourish. May the seeds of your mind be equally fruitful."

cards.name: Farseek
cards.text: Search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
cards.flavor: "How truly vast this city must be, that I have traveled so far and seen so much, yet never once found the place where the buildings fail."

cards.name: Flinthoof Boar
cards.text:
Flinthoof Boar gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Mountain.
{R}: Flinthoof Boar gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
cards.flavor: Through the smoke and flames it hunts, sniffing out the panicked and confused.

cards.name: Fog
cards.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
cards.flavor:
"I fear no army or beast, but only the morning fog. Our assault can survive everything else."
-Lord Hilneth

cards.name: Fungal Sprouting
cards.text: Create X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.
cards.flavor:
"Saprolings need only a host to feed upon. Numbers will take care of the rest."
-Ghave, Guru of Spores

cards.name: Garruk, Primal Hunter
cards.text:
[+1]: Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.
[−3]: Draw cards equal to the greatest power among creatures you control.
[−6]: Create a 6/6 green Wurm creature token for each land you control.

cards.name: Garruk's Packleader
cards.text: Whenever another creature with power 3 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"He has learned much in his long years. And unlike selfish humans, he's willing to share."
-Garruk Wildspeaker

cards.name: Ground Seal
cards.text:
When Ground Seal enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Cards in graveyards can't be the targets of spells or abilities.
cards.flavor:
"Let all we have buried be buried forever."
-Seton, centaur druid

cards.name: Mwonvuli Beast Tracker
cards.text: When Mwonvuli Beast Tracker enters the battlefield, search your library for a creature card with deathtouch, hexproof, reach, or trample and reveal it. Shuffle and put that card on top.
cards.flavor: "The more dangerous, the better."

foreignPrintings.name: Traqueuse de bête de la Mwônvouli
ムウォンヴーリーの獣記し

cards.name: Naturalize
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
cards.flavor:
"When your cities and trinkets crumble, only nature will remain."
-Garruk Wildspeaker

cards.name: Plummet
cards.text: Destroy target creature with flying.
cards.flavor:
"Let nothing own the skies but the wind."
-Dejara, Giltwood druid

cards.name: Predatory Rampage
cards.text: Creatures you control get +3/+3 until end of turn. Each creature your opponents control blocks this turn if able.
cards.flavor:
"It is the fate of the weak to fall."
-Garruk Wildspeaker

cards.name: Prey Upon
cards.text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
cards.flavor:
"You don't find many old werewolf hunters."
-Paulin, trapper of Somberwald

cards.name: Primal Huntbeast
cards.text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
cards.flavor:
"To the unskilled, it appears as blurred patches of distorted light. Few have seen its true form."
-Garruk Wildspeaker

cards.name: Primordial Hydra
cards.text:
Primordial Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, double the number of +1/+1 counters on Primordial Hydra.
Primordial Hydra has trample as long as it has ten or more +1/+1 counters on it.

cards.name: Quirion Dryad
cards.text: Whenever you cast a spell that's white, blue, black, or red, put a +1/+1 counter on Quirion Dryad.
cards.flavor:
"Never underestimate the ability of natural forces to adapt to unnatural influences."
-Molimo, maro-sorcerer

foreignPrintings.name: クウィリーオンのドライアド

cards.name: Rancor
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has trample.
When Rancor is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Rancor to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Ranger's Path
cards.text: Search your library for up to two Forest cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
cards.flavor: The forest can seem like a dense maze. Those who travel the canopy know otherwise.

cards.name: Revive
cards.text: Return target green card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: Even what is lost beyond recall returns when coaxed by a dryad's hand.

cards.name: Roaring Primadox
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor:
"They're easy enough to find. Question is, are you sure you want to find one?"
-Juruk, Kalonian tracker

foreignPrintings.name: 咆哮するプリマドックス

cards.name: Sentinel Spider
cards.text: Vigilance, reach
cards.flavor:
"Your first reaction may be to stand very still and hope she didn't see you. Trust me, she did."
-Endril, Kalonian naturalist

cards.name: Serpent's Gift
cards.text: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
cards.flavor: Venom is nature's way of redressing the imbalance between weak and mighty.

cards.name: Silklash Spider
cards.text:
Reach
{X}{G}{G}: Silklash Spider deals X damage to each creature with flying.
cards.flavor: By the time the spider comes to slurp up its dinner, its victims have been partially dissolved by acidic silk.

cards.name: Spiked Baloth
cards.text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
cards.flavor: If a baloth isn't hungry, it's dead.

cards.name: Thragtusk
cards.text:
When Thragtusk enters the battlefield, you gain 5 life.
When Thragtusk leaves the battlefield, create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.
cards.flavor:
"Always carry two spears."
-Mokgar, Kalonian hunter

cards.name: Timberpack Wolf
cards.text: Timberpack Wolf gets +1/+1 for each other creature you control named Timberpack Wolf.
cards.flavor:
"The need for the pack is bred in their bones. Their true strength will not show itself for any other purpose."
-Garruk Wildspeaker

foreignPrintings.name: Loup de la meute des forêts

cards.name: Titanic Growth
cards.text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The pup looked over the treetops, eyeing the man who just yesterday had kicked her. Suddenly, her hunger was infused with pure delight.

cards.name: Vastwood Gorger
cards.flavor:
"A long and difficult incision revealed that all vital organs are housed in the head, save for a long chain of stomachs, forty in all, leading from its throat to the end of the tail."
-Mulak Ffar, Vastwood Biodiversity

cards.name: Yeva, Nature's Herald
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
You may cast green creature spells as though they had flash.
cards.flavor: "I can call an army to my side in the blink of an eye. Best not blink."

cards.name: Yeva's Forcemage
cards.text: When Yeva's Forcemage enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "Nature can't be stopped. It rips and tears at Ravnica's tallest buildings to claim its place in the sun."

foreignPrintings.name: イェヴァの腕力魔道士

cards.name: Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker
cards.text:
[+3]: Destroy target noncreature permanent.
[−2]: Gain control of target creature.
[−9]: Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker deals 7 damage to target player or planeswalker. That player or that planeswalker's controller discards seven cards, then sacrifices seven permanents.

foreignPrintings.name: プレインズウォーカー、ニコル・ボーラス

cards.name: Akroma's Memorial
cards.text: Creatures you control have flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, and protection from black and from red.
cards.flavor:
"No rest. No mercy. No matter what."
-Memorial inscription

cards.name: Chronomaton
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Chronomaton.
cards.flavor: On the third night, the villagers destroyed their clocks. The sounds of whirring gears and chiming metal held only dread for them.

cards.name: Clock of Omens
cards.text: Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Untap target artifact.
cards.flavor: Most clocks measure time, but a few measure everything.

cards.name: Door to Nothingness
cards.text:
Door to Nothingness enters the battlefield tapped.
{W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Door to Nothingness: Target player loses the game.
cards.flavor: Only a madman could create such a door. Only an imbecile would open it.

cards.name: Elixir of Immortality
cards.text: {2}, {T}: You gain 5 life. Shuffle Elixir of Immortality and your graveyard into their owner's library.
cards.flavor:
"Bottled life. Not as tasty as I'm used to, rather stale, but it has the same effect."
-Baron Sengir

cards.name: Gem of Becoming
cards.text: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Gem of Becoming: Search your library for an Island card, a Swamp card, and a Mountain card. Reveal those cards and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Gilded Lotus
cards.text: {T}: Add three mana of any one color.
cards.flavor: Over such beauty, wars are fought. With such power, wars are won.

cards.name: Jayemdae Tome
cards.text: {4}, {T}: Draw a card.
cards.flavor: A true scribe devotes an entire lifetime to the creation of a single volume, a masterpiece as unique as its maker.

cards.name: Kitesail
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has flying.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
cards.flavor: Kitesailing is a way of life-and without practice, the end of it.

cards.name: Phyrexian Hulk
cards.flavor: An invasion weapon of ages past, the glistening oil contained the blueprints of countless atrocities.

foreignPrintings.name: ファイレクシアの大男

cards.name: Primal Clay
cards.text: As Primal Clay enters the battlefield, it becomes your choice of a 3/3 artifact creature, a 2/2 artifact creature with flying, or a 1/6 Wall artifact creature with defender in addition to its other types. (A creature with defender can't attack.)

cards.name: Ring of Evos Isle
cards.text:
{2}: Equipped creature gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on equipped creature if it's blue.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Ring of Kalonia
cards.text:
Equipped creature has trample. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on equipped creature if it's green.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Ring of Thune
cards.text:
Equipped creature has vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on equipped creature if it's white.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Ring of Valkas
cards.text:
Equipped creature has haste. (It can attack and {T} no matter when it came under your control.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on equipped creature if it's red.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Ring of Xathrid
cards.text:
{2}: Regenerate equipped creature. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on equipped creature if it's black.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Sands of Delirium
cards.text: {X}, {T}: Target player mills X cards.
cards.flavor: It counts down your last few moments of sanity.

cards.name: Staff of Nin
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card.
{T}: Staff of Nin deals 1 damage to any target.
cards.flavor:
"I have attuned the staff to your screams so that only I may benefit from your pain."
-Volux, disciple of Nin

cards.name: Stuffy Doll
cards.text:
Indestructible
As Stuffy Doll enters the battlefield, choose a player.
Whenever Stuffy Doll is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to the chosen player.
{T}: Stuffy Doll deals 1 damage to itself.

cards.name: Tormod's Crypt
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Tormod's Crypt: Exile all cards from target player's graveyard.
cards.flavor: Dominaria's most extravagant crypt nevertheless holds an empty grave.

cards.name: Trading Post
cards.text:
{1}, {T}, Discard a card: You gain 4 life.
{1}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Create a 0/1 white Goat creature token.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Draw a card.

cards.name: Cathedral of War
cards.text:
Cathedral of War enters the battlefield tapped.
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{T}: Add {C}.

cards.name: Dragonskull Summit
cards.text:
Dragonskull Summit enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Mountain.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

cards.name: Drowned Catacomb
cards.text:
Drowned Catacomb enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Swamp.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

cards.name: Evolving Wilds
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
cards.flavor: Without the interfering hands of civilization, nature will always shape itself to its own needs.

cards.name: Glacial Fortress
cards.text:
Glacial Fortress enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains or an Island.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.

cards.name: Hellion Crucible
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}{R}, {T}: Put a pressure counter on Hellion Crucible.
{1}{R}, {T}, Remove two pressure counters from Hellion Crucible and sacrifice it: Create a 4/4 red Hellion creature token with haste. (It can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

cards.name: Reliquary Tower
cards.text:
You have no maximum hand size.
{T}: Add {C}.
cards.flavor: Once guarded by the Knights of the Reliquary, the tower stands now protected only by its own remoteness, its dusty treasures open to plunder by anyone.

cards.name: Rootbound Crag
cards.text:
Rootbound Crag enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Forest.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.

cards.name: Sunpetal Grove
cards.text:
Sunpetal Grove enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Forest or a Plains.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.
